effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the target’s current Speed compared to the user, given by `1 + 25 * target Speed / user Speed`, capped at 150.

short_effect.sword_shield: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Power raises when the user has lower Speed, up to a maximum of 150.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.
